name: Atlas.new
tagline: The AI agent for maps and spatial data
description: Create maps, run analysis, and build spatial apps with AI - no GIS specialists required

name: PicKey AI
tagline: Secure your master password with a fun memory you love!
description: PicKey‚Äôs AI uses your favorite picture along with a 3D character to create an exceptionally strong Master Password. You no longer need to type or remember any text passwords. PicKey, being a visual password manager blends absolute security with effortless usability.

name: Trophy 1.0
tagline: Developer APIs for gamification: streaks, XP, badges, ranks
description: Ship gamification fast with flexible APIs for achievements, streaks, points, and leaderboards. Configure features without coding, automate personalized email and push notifications, and monitor impact on retention and engagement from a dashboard.

name: Superdesign Prompt Library
tagline: Design prompts for style, animation, components
description: Biggest community driven design prompt library, covering styles, animations, UI components, etc. You can build & share design prompts with your team privately or contribute publicly; It works with any coding agent

name: Drift
tagline: Screen recorder desktop app with cursor zoom effect
description: Professional screen recording studio that you can download Cinematic auto-zoom, privacy-first, no subscriptions. and you can choose between raw and the effect recording

name: Corgi Insurance
tagline: Modular coverage for startups: CGL, D&O, Tech E&O, Cyber
description: Corgi is a full-stack insurance carrier building better, faster insurance products for startups. We‚Äôre not a broker, so we underwrite and issue policies directly, with fewer handoffs, less friction, and better pricing. Corgi provides the following lines of coverage, and more: - Directors & Officers - Commercial General Liability - Tech Errors & Omissions - Cyber Liability - Employment Practices Liability - Media Liability - Hired and Non-Owned Auto - Representations & Warranties

name: Adject v1.5
tagline: Create hyper-realistic product images & videos instantly
description: Adject 1.5 introduces a fully project-based workflow for creating hyper-realistic product images and videos. Organize generations by project, switch between image and video modes, and create visuals using image-to-image, reference-based generation, image-to-video, and frame-to-video. Built for e-commerce brands that want studio-quality visuals without studios, photographers, or complex tools.

name: ¬†cubic 2.0
tagline: Code reviews for the AI era
description: Over the past few months, we've been completely rebuilding cubic's AI review engine. Today we're excited to announce cubic 2.0, the most accurate AI code reviewer available. cubic helps teams read, trust, and merge AI-generated code in real repos. It is optimized for accuracy and low noise, and it goes beyond PR comments with a CLI, AI docs, and PR description updates. Used by 100+ orgs including Cal.com, n8n, Granola, and Linux Foundation projects.

name: AirSome
tagline: The 'Aha!' moment for Airbnb reviews
description: AI-powered summaries of Airbnb reviews. Find dealbreakers in seconds. Stop wasting hours reading through dozens of Airbnb reviews. AirSome uses advanced AI to instantly summarize reviews and surface dealbreakers, so you can book with confidence in seconds instead of spending 15+ minutes per listing.

name: KNOA
tagline: The AI that captures your team's knowledge
description: The AI agent that conducts structured interviews, captures tacit knowledge and generates actionable reports. For your internal team or your clients.

name: VISONA - The most powerful canvas
tagline: One canvas. Many minds. Zero context loss.
description: Visona - the most powerful canvas for people and team - is a spatial operating system for your work. Instead of linear lists and buried folders, organize your world on an infinite whiteboard. Combine AI chat, notes, tasks, tables, media and docs visually. Deeply integrated with AI-powered versions of you, each with its own role, memory, and knowledge‚Äîso you can move from strategy to execution instantly.

name: AIPREP: AI Video Tutor
tagline: Ask a question. Get a video. Instantly.
description: Generate animated educational videos in 30 seconds from any text prompt or image. Try free now!

name: HuHu AI Studio Team Version
tagline: Enterprise-grade AI studio for bulk fashion content creation
description: Enterprise-grade platform designed for apparel and fashion businesses to produce product listing images, model photos, and marketing visuals at scale. Built for brands, manufacturers, and large content teams, it delivers: ‚Ä¢ ‚öôÔ∏è Bulk Try-On & large-scale asset generation ‚Ä¢ üßç‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è AI Model Generation (I2I, Face Gen, Layering, Multi-pose) ‚Ä¢ üé¨ Video Generation for campaigns & social media ‚Ä¢ üñºÔ∏è Editing & Enhancement Tools ‚Ä¢ üßë‚Äçü§ù‚Äçüßë Team / Program / Task Management

name: Map Your Voyage
tagline: Plan trips from Instagram reels in minutes, not weeks
description: Have thousands of saved Instagram travel reels you can't find when trip planning? Rewatching to extract locations & build daywise itineraries is exhausting‚Äîthat's why we built Map Your Voyage. Verify your IG account & DM us favorite travel content. We detect locations, add to country-specific bucket lists. Convert to daywise itineraries when ready.

name: aOCR
tagline: API for converting complex documents into structured data
description: a_OCR converts unstructured documents like PDFs and images into accurate, structured data ready for any workflow. Our multi-pass document processing pipeline combines advanced OCR with vision-language models to deliver state-of-the-art accuracy, reliability, and scalability at production scale.

name: Alpine
tagline: All your work in one place: docs, tasks, chat, AI and more
description: Alpine brings docs, tasks, and chat together in one app. See updates from across your company with an algorithmic feed. Work alongside AI agents that have complete context of everything you‚Äôre doing. Use alongside your current tools or replace them entirely.

name: Surfn AI
tagline: Build beautiful AI agent pages from your content in minutes
description: Surfn lets you build conversational AI Pages‚Äîbeautiful, on-brand AI agent pages you can share anywhere. Use them as interactive lead magnets, digital twins, qualifying & booking agents, AI coaches, course companions, and more. Your AI educates, qualifies, and takes action in real time‚Äîbooking calls, capturing leads, selling products, or guiding the next step. Share as a link, QR or embed across your site, newsletter, DMs, emails and more. Create your AI Page in under 5 minutes. No code needed

name: text.email
tagline: Email-to-SMS alerts. No API required.
description: Send an email, get a text instantly. AT&T, Verizon, T-Mobile, and the rest shut down their email-to-SMS gateways ‚Äî so your server alerts stopped working. text.email is the drop-in fix. We handle carrier compliance. From the team behind GMass.

name: Vibe Menu
tagline: Goodbye PDFs. Meet your AI menu
description: Vibe Menu is an AI-powered menu builder for restaurants. Create beautiful, interactive digital menus in minutes ‚Äî without designers, PDFs or friction. Just describe your dishes, and the AI builds a modern menu you can edit anytime. Built for real restaurant workflows: fast onboarding, easy updates, multilingual support, and mobile-first experience.

name: winlab
tagline: An AI-powered conversion-rate optimisation simulation lab
description: Standard AI audits are context-blind and unverified, often hurting conversions. Winlab replaces guessing with rigorous simulation. Unlike generic wrappers, we solve 3 fatal flaws: Context: We calibrate for specific traffic & goals (Cold vs Warm). Accuracy: Hybrid Vision+Code scanning prevents hallucinations. Validation: Agents run synthetic A/B tests on every fix. We don't just critique your site; we verify the solution works.
